title: What We Want From Pokemon Switch - Kinda Funny Gamescast Ep. 112 (Pt. 4)
description:
We discuss what we want to see from a Switch Pokemon game.

Thanks to Dollar Shave Club for sponsoring this episode. Go to http://www.dollarshaveclub.com/kinda

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Every day Greg Miller, Colin Moriarty, and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.
